post.body: I know I would, just for weird looks. I love that, it's hilarious.
Return it?
Right back at'cha!
Thanks! :)
I'm glad you like the stockings.
You're crazy, shopping today....
Here - it was really easy, just traced my old one: http://i18.photobucket.com/albums/b117/beanbun/DSCF1043.jpg
Same here! What a drag. Marky Mark acts about as good as a cardboard box.
Thanks hon!
I used flannel, your fabric needs to be 100% cotton.
Thanks! I am feeling a lot better.
Paycheck is always good. Yay moneys!
Aww, thanks for the concern and the good wishes!
Hahaha, I hear you on that.
Thanks!
Aww, no awesome day for me. :( I hate shopping for Christmas!
Hear hear!
New plus-size hoodie in the store - http;//beanbun.etsy.com
I opened a brand-new tub of sour cream and it's full of yogurt. WTF?
If you like my bags, find my bag in this comic and I'll give you 30% off on any item in my store! http://twitter.com/JGrayWebcomic
Anyone who likes webcomics, go check out my friend http://twitter.com/JGrayWebcomic and follow him! He's adorable and his comics are great.
Just listed Christmas stockings with a creepy twist on Etsy - http://beanbun.etsy.com
And totally got caught up shopping with my friend, so no pictures yet today.
So, tomorrow I shoot some new items. I'm excited. :P
Hey there new Twitter followers! :) be sure to check out my store at beanbun.etsy.com
Makin' stockings... you know you need a bad-ass stocking.
Ha-ha! The hoodie is nearly done, just needs cuffs. I'll get cute pics of Chelly modeling it on Sunday. :) First awesome WL hoodie!
Neat neon-green and black stripe hoodie shrug should be up for grabs Sunday. I'll probably finish it tonight. :P
LOL, I meant "belated"....
Happy belted Thanksgiving! 20% off sale through Sunday in my Etsy shop, check it out at http://beanbun.etsy.com
Check it out! http://tinyurl.com/55g3ug
Glittering Nintendo dress of doom~! is almost done, thank god.
Sending out christmas cards to all my peeps....
Here's the new board - http://i18.photobucket.com/albums/b117/beanbun/DSCF1043.jpg
Ironing board cover - DONE! Now my bad-ass iron has a bad-ass board.
Sewing minky fur is really odd. :O
Max Payne the movie flat-out sucked.
First week at the new job almost over... having lots of fun but not enough time to sew. Poopty.
How is it I get sick on the weekend, so I have to rest and I can't sew as much as I wanted? Fail.
I GOT A TREASURY! GO LOOK! http://tinyurl.com/ayzb4k
Yay hopefully I will have an awesome day. I go Christmas shopping for supplies now! :)
Good lord, work is boring today.
